title: institute francais Two Sans Serifs
content:
I am trying to ID both the all caps and the u/lc here.  
thank you!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [maroc.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150425023829/http:/typophile.com/files/maroc.jpg) | 51.62 KB |
author: nwusher

comments.content:
Possibly: Monotype MT/DIN Next W10 Medium  
 [http://www.fonts.com/font/linotype/din-next/medium/web-font](http://web.archive.org/web/20150425023829/http:/www.fonts.com/font/linotype/din-next/medium/web-font)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150425023829im_/http:/typophile.com/files/conc1_3929.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150425023829im_/http:/typophile.com/files/conc2_4193.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150425023829im_/http:/typophile.com/files/conc3_4672.jpg)

Dick is right. That's all DIN but not the DIN Next which terminals are angled cut. Try [DIN FF](http://web.archive.org/web/20150425023829/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontfont/ff-din), that should work correctly.
